name: "Dark"
description:
A 2D Survival game for "Mini Jam 123 : Web"

Game play: Help the kid from Giant Spider.

Controls: Use the Four Button's.

Software used :  Unity 3D + Visual studio, Photoshop(Graphic assets), Animate cc & Spine 2D (For Animation's)

Team Members : 1 (Me)

*All Graphic assets, Animations & Codes are made by me during the Jam's timeline.

Hope you like it..................

https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/43141  (My Portfolio and Website link)
